column4: ok just one question before I start yanking cards around (ROFL....me funny) = recoken it wouldn't be difficult to use an ati all-in-wonder radeon 7500 for vga, tv viewing, and to record video to the hd even if I need seperate software for some of the functions?
That'd be really easy on windows.
I don't know, but my friends have never gotten their ATI cards to work properly.
